Concept Development

The first step of intuitive learning is to understand the concept. And this is what we focus on. Having a solid basic is must for good learning.

Application of Concepts

We give examples, simulations and presentations to clear the application of the concept taught in the class.

Relation of the concepts to real life.

What is the need of learning a concept if you can't even relate it to real life. We strive very hard to relate each and every concept to real life, so that understanding becomes easier.

Get Updates, assignment on your mobile!

We are equipped with latest technology. Get all your assignments,test notifications, your attendence and fee details directly to your mobile. Be it extra class or be it A.O.C. Class(well it's our special class) you are notified on your mobile.

Highest average in each subject

We at Maharaja Academy focus on quality not quantity. Taking everybody forward is always a difficult task and that is what we do .

Feeling Stressed? :(

We organise various workshops to motivate you and develop your personality. The workshops are conducted by some very reputed speakers,motivators and mentors.

Who we are?

Maharaja Academy is a coaching Institute in Rohini(Pooth Kalan),Delhi-110086,India.Founded in 2009, with a vision to develop scientific perception in students.
